plot: A forever young teenager and an immortal warlord quest for The Salamander Cross; the one thing that will allow one to destroy the other for good.
title: Wonder Boy
plot_es: A forever young teenager and an immortal warlord quest for The Salamander Cross; the one thing that will allow one to destroy the other for good.
plot_en: A forever young teenager and an immortal warlord quest for The Salamander Cross; the one thing that will allow one to destroy the other for good.
